summary: This bill, the "Fair Pay for Federal Contractors Act of 2025," addresses compensation for employees of federal contractors affected by government shutdowns. It mandates that federal agencies adjust contract prices to compensate contractors for costs incurred due to furloughs, layoffs, reduced hours, or reduced compensation for their employees during lapses in appropriations. The bill includes provisions for back pay, limitations on compensation amounts, and a report to Congress on adjustments made. It also authorizes appropriations for these adjustments.
